basics.name: Christiana Funmilola Olusegun
basics.label: Atmospheric and Climate Scientist
basics.summary: Atmospheric and climate scientist with expertise in regional climate modeling, geospatial data analysis, and climate–agriculture interactions. Demonstrated record of interdisciplinary research, collaboration, and mentoring across Africa, Europe, and North America.

work.name: Michigan State University
work.summary: Conducting research on the impacts of climate variability and change on agricultural production systems and resilience using numerical and process-based modeling, climate simulations (CMIP6 and CORDEX), and open-source computational tools to translate complex data into actionable environmental insights.

work.name: The Federal University of Technology
work.position: Research Fellow and Co-PI (50% Contract Position)
work.summary: Engaged in numerical climate modeling, programming, and geospatial data analysis for regional climate applications.

work.name: University of Warsaw
work.summary: Focused on air pollution assessment using field-based measurements, remote sensing observations, and data-driven analytical approaches.

work.name: Karlsruhe Institute of Technology
work.summary: Worked on numerical climate modeling and geospatial data analysis.
